plot: A heart wrenching tale of two teddy bears, Maverick & Martha, who fall in love but later bare the brunt of a relationship break up when the couple that own them split.
title: Unbearable
plot_es: A heart wrenching tale of two teddy bears, Maverick & Martha, who fall in love but later bare the brunt of a relationship break up when the couple that own them split.
plot_en: A heart wrenching tale of two teddy bears, Maverick & Martha, who fall in love but later bare the brunt of a relationship break up when the couple that own them split.
